prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that resembles a candle with a playful spirit and a mysterious aura.
Imagine a small, ghostly creature with a flickering flame on its head, perfect for spooky adventures.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the essence of light and shadow, featuring a soft glow and whimsical charm.
Generate a cute, floating Pokemon that blends ghostly characteristics with a hint of fire, ideal for urban settings.
Make a unique Pokemon that has a candle-like shape and playful eyes, embodying a friendly ghost.
Show me a charming ghost-type creature with a soft blue body and a purple flame that captivates all who see it.
Give me a visual of a tiny ghost Pokemon with a whimsical design, perfect for enchanting encounters.

distinctive_features: Yellow dot indicating a candle wick
